comments.content: Hi. I am Ann from Taichung. I have started my online class to improve my speaking for business demand. We don't have the environment to speak English in Taiwan. Anyway, nice to meet you.

comments.content: hello, I am bigbee from taipei, I am also nice to practice English with you .

Hi, I'm James.
Just the same situation I faced in my school time, even in my company. As a matter of fact, I don't give a shit about what those rigid and ambitiousless guys thought. For the purpose of discovering more interesting knowledge, I'm almost employed myself in learning English, leave no stone unturned to inhale books as many as possible.
And there is always an opened gate in front of us, right? Cheer up.

True,that's y ppl can't make progress nd keep blaming on 22k salary or smaller vision,I don't even want to keep their trash talk in mind at all.
BTW,Nice 2 meet you : )
Melbourne is a nice place ,not matter climate or ppl,fit to Taiwan lifestyle.

I want to share my way of speaking English.

It is quite hard to practice English especially speaking, so I invite my cousin to speak with me in English.

In addition, we also type words and sentences in Line using English.

Unless we don't know how to say a word or a sentence, then we will speak it in Chinese.

It is very interesting and it is also able to practice English speaking, very fun!
